headline: UBS Downgrades Evergy, Inc. (EVRG) to Neutral, Raises its Price Target to $88
summary: Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) is among the 11 Best All-Time High Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street. On February 13, 2026, UBS analyst William Appicelli downgraded Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) to Neutral from Buy and raised the price target to $88 from $86 previously. William Appicelli cited limited upside after strong regulatory performance and share price strength […]
